ygData.subject: Re: Where to Hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... not ...I ... It depends on the server, are you on a pvp server? If you are, if depends on the race. If not then i would suggest, LOIO, The oasis, and high
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Masteradept"
<masteradept007@y...> wrote:
> I have a question for all who read this.
> Where would you hunt at 17 if you had an enchanter and did
not ...I
> repeat did not want to goto PC.

It depends on the server, are you on a pvp server? If you are, if
depends on the race. If not then i would suggest, LOIO, The oasis,
and high hold pass, and if your lucky you can get into a high hold
keep grp, it all depends, also if you good, you can solo in those
areas except, high hold keep. There is also a place where mud people
live, but i cant remember where, that has good exp, plus all the
clay you can hold.
